content: UBET is a decentralized sports betting platform that enables sports trading using USDT/C. UBet’s approach to sports betting is distinct from traditional sports betting sites because UBET is focused on fair P2P sports trading rather than profits. UBET prioritizes safety protocols, smart contract deployments, and audits to ensure the security of our users. The platform is now in the Testnet phase. During the testnet phase, they are offering tournaments and referral contests in which users may participate and win real USDC token rewards. Before going to launch the Mainnet version they are seeking for some high-ranked, well-known WEB3.0 bitcointalk people to review their sportsbook. They strive to provide the best sports betting experience for their users and constantly working to improve the platform, but they also need your help. By leaving a review about the UBET sportsbook, you can help them to understand what they are doing well and where we need to improve. For now, they are looking for High ranked (Hero/Legendary) 4 people to review them. If you meet the requirements of profile rank and are well-known about WEB 3, please drop your application here.Why UBET?Non-custodial and securityCan not ban you even if you are a sharp bettor.Wager size is unlimited (but vig grows W.r.t wager size)Lower minimum vig compared to traditional sportsbooksHolding US currency is much better than holding other countries' currencies.How to Get Started?More Info: https://ubet-sports.gitbook.io/about-ubet/get-started/get-startedHow the campaign will work and pay rate?Every Accepted user will be paid $30 worth of BTC.You need to apply with your BTC wallet, Later after accepting participants I will ask you about your wallet address or email address (Connect wallet->Magic to signup with email). The team will add UBUCKS credit for testing. Test the platform and leave your honest review here in this thread according to the review format.What should you focus on during the review?1. User interface: How was their experience navigating the platform?2. Payment: Experience of Connecting Metamask wallet, and deposit and withdraw. 3. You can talk about their vision & mission, More info https://www.ubetsports.io/who-we-are4. Healthy sports betting community- Talk about Discord and Telegram community.5. Rewards and promotions: Testnet phase they offer free betting tournaments and referral contests collect rewards as USDC token. So it's a big opportunity for you and it does not matter whether you are accepted or not for review, you can still participate in their running sports betting and referral contest.To place your bets on the platform, they are offering free UBUCKS test tokens. These tokens can be obtained by sharing your UBET or Metamask address on Discord's #tournament-support channel https://discord.gg/B97FJW97Ep, Telegram https://t.me/ubet_request_ubcksGeneral Rules?1. Only Hero/Legendary and above can apply2. Alternative accounts are not allowed3. If you get a red trust from a DT member with a valid reason, you are not allowed to apply.4. You must make the review within 7days of getting accepted.5. Don't edit and add your review to your application post, create a new post for your review.6. comments.body: Review:I tested the site out after receiving UBUCKS successfully by placing some bets in various football markets since I usually deal with Cricket and Football betting. Below are my observations.User Interface:- I loved the entire black and green site theme which blended well with all the UI elements of the site. I liked the name and symbol of the site too which I felt were quite unique.- Demo markets in various places are very helpful for beginners and I like the fact that they are explained properly through the information symbols.- Placing bets was a relatively simple process and vigorish being updated in real-time is easily one of the biggest pros of this site.- I was surprised to see no scroll bars in various parts of the site. Checking places where we can manually scroll is annoying which is why scroll bars need to be added asap.Payments:- I didn't check metamask since I opted for the magic option. Linking my email account through magic was a breeze. After confirming my email, logging into the site basically took around 2-3 seconds. If you don't log-out, you will stay logged in for future sessions.- I received 2 deposits pretty quickly though I didn't withdraw anything, but I am expecting it to work smoothly without any issues.- I was able to redeem my winnings successfully, but I noticed one of my bets never got settled and it still shows 'Live'. This is a bug which needs to be resolved asap.Goals:- Ubet is aiming at doing something completely unique which is pitting punters against liquidity providers using their automatic algorithm. They are taking advantage of Web 3.0 tech to provide a completely decentralized experience.- Centralised sportsbooks pit punters against the house while exchanges pit them against each other which is why Ubet's approach is completely different and worth appreciating.Community:- I checked out their Discord and Telegram communities and observed that their mods were doing a good job answering any queries that bettors had pretty quickly. For example, Daniel(Telegram mod) answered and resolved all of my queries quickly.Rewards and Promotions:- Beta phase rewards are very, very tempting. They are currently running a tournament where everyone bet with UBUCKS(Free and Fake currency) and whoever lands in the top-10 end up receiving USDC rewards which is real money basically.- You simply join their Discord/Telegram communities and request UBUCKS which you will receive in a couple of hours. You can use them to place and win more UBUCKS in order to try and join the top 10.Overall, I had a great time testing the site out and am looking forward to playing here primarily because of their unique betting approach and their willingness to accept sharp bettors.
